alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 21 at 1:37PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southern California, including the Morongo Basin of southwest San Bernardino County. * WHEN...Until 445 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways including State Route 62. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 133 PM PDT, CHP reported flooding over State Route 62 between Yucca Valley and Joshua Tree. Between 0.5 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen since this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Yucca Valley, Joshua Tree, Morongo Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
